long_description: The E-Case iSeries iPad case cloaks your sensitive tablet in reliable protection from moisture when you're out enjoying the water or wet weather. Tough, completely transparent polyurethane windows are soft enough to let you read and use buttons without removing device from the case. PVC-free polyurethane material resists UV damage thus remains transparent. SealLock closure helps ensure waterproof performance down to 1m for 30 min. The E-Case iSeries iPad case attaches to a kayak deck or pack straps using cords or clips (not included) and 2 corner lash points.
short_description: The E-Case iSeries iPad case cloaks your sensitive tablet in reliable protection from moisture when you're out enjoying the water or wet weather.
